00040 using System;
00041 using MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources;
00042 
00043 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Distributions
00044 {
00052     public sealed class LaplaceDistribution : ContinuousDistribution
00053     {
00054         double _location;
00055         double _scale;
00056 
00057         #region Construction
00058 
00059 
00060 
00061 
00062         public
00063         LaplaceDistribution()
00064             : base()
00065         {
00066             SetDistributionParameters(0.0, 1.0);
00067         }
00068 
00077         public
00078         LaplaceDistribution(
00079             RandomSource random
00080             )
00081             : base(random)
00082         {
00083             SetDistributionParameters(0.0, 1.0);
00084         }
00085 
00090         public
00091         LaplaceDistribution(
00092             double location,
00093             double scale
00094             )
00095             : base()
00096         {
00097             SetDistributionParameters(location, scale);
00098         }
00099         #endregion
00100 
00101         #region Distribution Parameters
00102 
00103 
00104 
00105         public double Location
00106         {
00107             get { return _location; }
00108             set { SetDistributionParameters(value, _scale); }
00109         }
00110 
00114         public double Scale
00115         {
00116             get { return _scale; }
00117             set { SetDistributionParameters(_location, value); }
00118         }
00119 
00123         public
00124         void
00125         SetDistributionParameters(
00126             double location,
00127             double scale
00128             )
00129         {
00130             if(!IsValidParameterSet(location, scale))
00131             {
00132                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentParameterSetInvalid);
00133             }
00134 
00135             _location = location;
00136             _scale = scale;
00137         }
00138 
00145         public static
00146         bool
00147         IsValidParameterSet(
00148             double location,
00149             double scale
00150             )
00151         {
00152             return scale > 0;
00153         }
00154         #endregion
00155 
00156         #region Distribution Properties
00157 
00158 
00159 
00160         public override double Minimum
00161         {
00162             get { return double.MinValue; }
00163         }
00164 
00168         public override double Maximum
00169         {
00170             get { return double.MaxValue; }
00171         }
00172 
00176         public override double Mean
00177         {
00178             get { return _location; }
00179         }
00180 
00184         public override double Median
00185         {
00186             get { return _location; }
00187         }
00188 
00192         public override double Variance
00193         {
00194             get { return 2.0 * _scale * _scale; }
00195         }
00196 
00200         public override double Skewness
00201         {
00202             get { return 0.0; }
00203         }
00204 
00208         public override
00209         double
00210         ProbabilityDensity(
00211             double x
00212             )
00213         {
00214             return 1.0 / (2.0 * _scale) * Math.Exp(-Math.Abs(x - _location) / _scale);
00215         }
00216 
00220         public override
00221         double
00222         CumulativeDistribution(
00223             double x
00224             )
00225         {
00226             if(x < _location)
00227             {
00228                 return 0.5 * Math.Exp((x - _location) / _scale);
00229             }
00230 
00231             return 1.0 - 0.5 * Math.Exp((_location - x) / _scale);
00232         }
00233         #endregion
00234 
00235         #region Generator
00236 
00237 
00238 
00239 
00240         public override
00241         double
00242         NextDouble()
00243         {
00244             double rand = 0.5 - this.RandomSource.NextDouble();
00245             return _location - _scale * Math.Sign(rand) * Math.Log(2.0 * Math.Abs(rand));
00246         }
00247         #endregion
00248     }
00249 }
